trans-unit.source: Bant's armies are primarily composed of members of the Mortar caste, loyal commoners who haven't yet earned a sigil.
trans-unit.target: 班特的军队主要以莫达种姓的人组成，是群忠贞而尚未获得印记的凡夫俗子。

trans-unit.source: Angel's Herald
trans-unit.target: 天使传令

trans-unit.resname: ALA·2 | Angel's Herald | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice a green creature, a white creature, and a blue creature: Search your library for a card named Empyrial Archangel and put it into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {2}{W}，{T}，牺牲一个绿色生物，一个白色生物，以及一个蓝色生物：从你的牌库中搜寻一张名称为穹光大天使的牌，并将之放置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Rigorous faith and belief are rewarded on occasion, and richly so.
trans-unit.target: 严格的忠诚与信念偶尔能获得极丰厚的回报。

trans-unit.source: Angelic Benediction
trans-unit.target: 天使祈福

trans-unit.source: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)\nWhenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may tap target creature.
trans-unit.target: 颂威 （每当一个由你操控的生物单独攻击时，该生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。） 每当一个由你操控的生物单独攻击时，你可以横置目标生物。

trans-unit.source: "Even in single combat, I am never alone."\n—Rafiq of the Many
trans-unit.target: 「就算独身战斗，我也从不孤单。」 ～千印莱菲

trans-unit.source: Angelsong
trans-unit.target: 天使祷曲

trans-unit.source: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: 于本回合中，防止将造成的所有战斗伤害。 循环{2} （{2}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.source: Clash of sword and cry of beast fall mute when angels sound the call to prayer.
trans-unit.target: 天使祷声传杨，让刀剑交击与野兽咆哮归诸宁静。

trans-unit.source: "A night attack will be easy. We'll make an air raid over the Akrasan border. Just get me some flint to light the war torches."
trans-unit.target: 「夜袭很简单。 我们将从阿卡沙边境发动空袭。 只要给我些打火石点燃火把就行。」

trans-unit.source: Battlegrace Angel

trans-unit.source: Flying\nExalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)\nWhenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gains lifelink until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 颂威 （每当一个由你操控的生物单独攻击时，该生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。） 每当一个由你操控的生物单独攻击时，它获得系命异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·7 | Cradle of Vitality | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cradle of Vitality
trans-unit.target: 孕育活力

trans-unit.resname: ALA·7 | Cradle of Vitality | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature for each 1 life you gained.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，你可以支付{1}{W}。 若你如此作，则你每获得1点生命，就在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·7 | Cradle of Vitality | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Naya's trees grow tall and sturdy. Their foliage intertwines to form dewcups, rainwater pools where the elves gather to celebrate life.
trans-unit.target: 纳雅的树木长得高大强壮。 树叶交缠形成露杯，地精从中收集雨露以赞颂生命。

trans-unit.source: Dispeller's Capsule
trans-unit.target: 驱散者坠盒

trans-unit.resname: ALA·8 | Dispeller's Capsule | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: {2}{W}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.source: "I find its symmetry pleasing. It rids our world of offensive refuse while disposing of itself."\n—Dolomarus, Proctor of the Clean
trans-unit.target: 「这对称性相当有趣： 它把带有攻击性又不该存于世上的东西与它本身一同处理掉。」 ～理净师多洛马勒

trans-unit.source: Elspeth, Knight-Errant
trans-unit.target: 游侠艾紫培

trans-unit.resname: ALA·9 | Elspeth, Knight-Errant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: +1: Put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token into play.\n+1: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.\n-8: For the rest of the game, artifacts, creatures, enchantments, and lands you control are indestructible.
trans-unit.target: +1：将一个1/1白色士兵衍生物放置进场。 +1：目标生物得+3/+3并获得飞行异能直到回合结束。 -8：直到这盘对战结束，由你操控的神器，生物，结界，以及地都不会毁坏。

trans-unit.source: Ethersworn Canonist
trans-unit.target: 乙金盟法规师

trans-unit.resname: ALA·10 | Ethersworn Canonist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player who has played a nonartifact spell this turn can't play additional nonartifact spells.
trans-unit.target: 本回合已使用过非神器咒语的牌手不能再使用任何非神器咒语。

trans-unit.source: "The noble work of our order is to infuse all life on Esper with etherium. Our goal will be reached more rapidly if new life is . . . suppressed."
trans-unit.target: 「本教派的崇高目标，就是将乙金注入艾斯波所有生命中。 让目标加速达成的方法就是...抑制新生命。」

trans-unit.source: Excommunicate

trans-unit.target: 将目标生物置于其拥有者的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: Rebels and other malcontents forced into the ritual awake lost in Topa's vast savannahs. Those who find their way back return humble and repentant.
trans-unit.target: 反抗者与其他不满现状者被迫进行此仪式，醒来后发现自己置身托帕的广阔草原。 回得来的人都带着谦卑悔悟的心境。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·12 | Guardians of Akrasa | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 阿卡沙守护者

trans-unit.resname: ALA·12 | Guardians of Akrasa | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Only by the bravery of those who put loyalty above glory is our home kept safe."\n—Elspeth
trans-unit.target: 「靠着重视忠诚甚于荣耀者的义行，我们的家园方保安宁。」 ～艾紫培

trans-unit.source: "The elves claim the canopy. The nacatl claim the mountains. I suppose you think we ought to stay on the jungle floor?"
trans-unit.target: 「地精在林冠称雄。 拿卡地则称霸群山。 而你还要我们乖乖待在丛林地面上？」

trans-unit.target: 邪恶势力打算在班特散布恐惧与怀疑，而尊天骑士团不知不觉地提供了协助。

trans-unit.source: The cup was a gift from the sphinx Tameron, who hoped that those who drank from it would live long enough to decrypt the sphinxes' wisdom.
trans-unit.target: 这杯子是史芬斯谭莫琅的赠礼，她希望用它饮水的人都能获致长寿，才能通晓史芬斯的智慧。

trans-unit.source: Metallurgeon

trans-unit.source: A circle of light and a word of confinement.

trans-unit.source: At his side, humble beasts become weapons more deadly than sharpened steel.
trans-unit.target: 生性温和的动物为他战斗时，也能成为比利剑更强大的武器。

trans-unit.target: 将目标进行攻击的生物移出对战。 循环{5}{G}{W}{U} （{5}{G}{W}{U}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。） 当你循环CARDNAME时，将至多两个目标进行攻击的生物移出对战。

trans-unit.target: {4}{G}：CARDNAME对每位牌手和每个具飞行异能的生物造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Aven bandits can be sly. You've got to fill the sky with boulders—and then seek cover immediately."\n—Knight-Captain Wyhorn

trans-unit.target: 机械师在乙金存量不足时，会派出石像鬼到遥远彼方搜寻可用材料。

trans-unit.target: 除垢沙漏

trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy all permanents except for artifacts and lands. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：消灭所有既非神器亦非地的永久物。 你只可以于你的维持中使用此异能。

trans-unit.source: "Soon I will sleep, eyes closing to a world tarnished with flesh, and then wake to a polished vision."\n—Sharuum
trans-unit.target: 「很快地，我将进入梦乡，将这遭肉身污损的世界关在双眼之外；然后醒来迎接明净光景。」 ～韶伦

trans-unit.target: 颂威 （每当一个由你操控的生物单独攻击时，该生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。） {U}：CARDNAME获得帷幕异能直到回合结束。 （它不能成为咒语或异能的目标。）

trans-unit.target: 每个印记都代表着受肯定的重大成就，也象征了对授印者应履行的责任。

trans-unit.source: An avatar he sculpts of fellowship and light.
trans-unit.target: 以情谊与明光塑造的化身。

trans-unit.source: Sunseeders quest for areas of open sky. They train plowbeasts to beat back the dense jungle long enough to cultivate a crop.
trans-unit.target: 日种农人需要一大片的空旷农地。 他们训练犁兽开垦浓密丛林边境，将之化为良田。

trans-unit.target: 「这爪子会深深刺进皮肤底下，但总比给丢下来要好。」 ～千印莱菲

trans-unit.target: 循环{2} （{2}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.target: 「囚禁巨兽来作这种粗活，根本是违背天理。 我但愿他能记得谁才是大地的主人。」 ～地精神疗师赛意娜

trans-unit.resname: ALA·32 | Call to Heel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: On Bant, a sigil is both a prize of honor and a bond of duty. The one who bears it may be called to fulfill that charge at any moment.
trans-unit.target: 在班特，印记是荣誉的勋章，也是责任的束缚。 持有者随时都有可能要履行应负的义务。

trans-unit.target: 取消

trans-unit.source: "What you are attempting is not against the law. It is, however, extremely foolish."

trans-unit.source: "Forget. Only then will there be space for hope between the pain and fear."

trans-unit.source: Cloudheath Drake
trans-unit.target: 云原龙兽

trans-unit.resname: ALA·35 | Cloudheath Drake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{1}{W}: CARDNAME gains vigilance until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {1}{W}：CARDNAME获得警戒异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: A permanent storm rages over the plain of Cloudheath, and drakes ride its currents—two reminders that some elements of Esper will not be controlled.
trans-unit.target: 暴风总是笼罩云原，龙兽随其风潮飞翔～这两样东西提醒着艾斯波人：此地还有一些元素不愿受控制。

trans-unit.source: Coma Veil
trans-unit.target: 昏迷帘幕

trans-unit.resname: ALA·36 | Coma Veil | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant artifact or creature\nEnchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 神器结界或生物结界 受此结界的永久物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: Etherium does not know sleep. Only magic can teach it the resting state of cold steel.
trans-unit.target: 乙金不需要睡眠。 只有法术才能教会它何谓金属的休眠状态。

trans-unit.source: Courier's Capsule
trans-unit.target: 讯使坠盒

trans-unit.resname: ALA·37 | Courier's Capsule | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: In ages past, Esper couriers bore messages written on ornate scrolls. The medium has grown more sophisticated, but the principle remains the same.
trans-unit.target: 在很久以前，艾斯波讯使身上携带的是写在华美卷轴上的讯息。 承载讯息的东西已更加精致，但原理依旧相同。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·38 | Covenant of Minds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Covenant of Minds
trans-unit.target: 心灵盟约

trans-unit.resname: ALA·38 | Covenant of Minds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Target opponent may choose to put those cards into your hand. If he or she doesn't, put those cards into your graveyard and draw five cards.
trans-unit.target: 展示你牌库顶的三张牌。 目标对手可以选择将这些牌置入你手上。 若他不如此作，则你将这些牌置入你的坟墓场并抓五张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·38 | Covenant of Minds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Before signing anything on Grixis, always read the fine print.
trans-unit.target: 在格利极，签署名字之前得先把小字全部看完。

trans-unit.source: Dawnray Archer
trans-unit.target: 晨辉箭手

trans-unit.resname: ALA·39 | Dawnray Archer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)\n{W}, {T}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
trans-unit.target: 颂威 （每当一个由你操控的生物单独攻击时，该生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。） {W}，{T}：CARDNAME对目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Their shots are fired most often as signals—or at those who didn't get the message.
trans-unit.target: 他们射箭多半是用来表示讯息～或是拿来对付那些看不懂的人。

trans-unit.source: Esper Battlemage
trans-unit.target: 艾斯波战法术师

trans-unit.resname: ALA·40 | Esper Battlemage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.\n{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {W}，{T}：于本回合中，防止接下来将对你造成的2点伤害。 {B}，{T}：目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: She can heal the flesh, or exploit its many weaknesses.
trans-unit.target: 她能医治肉身，也能利用其诸多弱点。

trans-unit.source: Etherium Astrolabe
trans-unit.target: 乙金星盘

trans-unit.resname: ALA·41 | Etherium Astrolabe | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\n{B}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 {B}，{T}，牺牲一个神器：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Speculation is foolish when the tools of certainty are available."\n—Cinna, vedalken consul
trans-unit.target: 「如果有可靠的工具可用，何苦要白费心力来推测？」 ～维多肯领事欣娜

trans-unit.source: Etherium Sculptor
trans-unit.target: 乙金塑师

trans-unit.resname: ALA·42 | Etherium Sculptor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Artifact spells you play cost {1} less to play.
trans-unit.target: 你使用的神器咒语费用减少{1}来使用。

trans-unit.source: The greatest masters of the craft abandon tools altogether, shaping metal with hand and mind alone.
trans-unit.target: 技艺最高明的匠人完全不靠工具，只以心灵与双手塑造金属。

trans-unit.source: Fatestitcher
trans-unit.target: 织命灵俑

trans-unit.source: {T}: You may tap or untap another target permanent.\nUnearth {U} ({U}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：你可以横置或重置另一个目标永久物。 破坟{U} （{U}：将此牌从你的坟墓场移回场上。 它获得敏捷。 于它将离场时，或在回合结束时，将它移出对战。 破坟的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Filigree Sages
trans-unit.target: 丝金录智者

trans-unit.resname: ALA·44 | Filigree Sages | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}: Untap target artifact.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}：重置目标神器。

trans-unit.source: "We of the Sanctum Arcanum have pondered every word on every page of the Filigree Texts. If you can't say the same, don't bother speaking."
trans-unit.target: 「大奥圣所成员都思考过丝金录每一页的每一个字。 如果你办不到，就别多说什么。」

trans-unit.source: Gather Specimens
trans-unit.target: 收集样本

trans-unit.resname: ALA·45 | Gather Specimens | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If a creature would come into play under an opponent's control this turn, it comes into play under your control instead.
trans-unit.target: 本回合中，如果某生物将在对手的操控下进场，则它改为在你的操控下进场。

trans-unit.source: "It's free to do whatever it wants. I've merely told it what that is."\n—Xorin, Architect of Will
trans-unit.target: 「他可以随意行事。 我只是告诉他该要些什么。」 ～构念师索林

trans-unit.source: Jhessian Lookout
trans-unit.target: 介斯警戒员

trans-unit.source: She stands ready, always watchful, knowing that weeks of peace and serenity can be overturned by a single distant sail.
trans-unit.target: 她随时提高警觉、严阵以待，因为远处的孤帆随时都可能打破持续数周的平静祥和。

trans-unit.source: Kathari Screecher
trans-unit.target: 尖鸣卡刹立

trans-unit.resname: ALA·47 | Kathari Screecher | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nUnearth {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 破坟{2}{U} （{2}{U}：将此牌从你的坟墓场移回场上。 它获得敏捷。 于它将离场时，或在回合结束时，将它移出对战。 破坟的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Kederekt Leviathan
trans-unit.target: 奇登磊海怪

trans-unit.resname: ALA·48 | Kederekt Leviathan | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, return all other nonland permanents to their owners' hands.\nUnearth {6}{U} ({6}{U}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将所有其他非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。 破坟{6}{U} （{6}{U}：将此牌从你的坟墓场移回场上。 它获得敏捷。 于它将离场时，或在回合结束时，将它移出对战。 破坟的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.resname: ALA·49 | Master of Etherium | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Master of Etherium
trans-unit.target: 乙金大师

trans-unit.resname: ALA·49 | Master of Etherium | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.\nOther artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量与防御力各等同于由你操控的神器之数量。 由你操控的其他神器生物得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·49 | Master of Etherium | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."
trans-unit.target: 「未受肉身束缚的心灵，才得见世界真貌。」

trans-unit.source: Memory Erosion
trans-unit.target: 侵蚀记忆

trans-unit.resname: ALA·50 | Memory Erosion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent plays a spell, that player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手使用咒语时，该牌手将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: "The Filigree Texts do not compel you to act in accordance with their precepts. They only specify the consequences should you fail."\n—Lodus of the Ethersworn
trans-unit.target: 「丝金录并未规定你必须遵从其上的戒律。 上面只列出不从的后果。」 ～乙金盟的罗得斯

trans-unit.source: Mindlock Orb
trans-unit.target: 锁灵法球

trans-unit.resname: ALA·51 | Mindlock Orb | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Players can't search libraries.
trans-unit.target: 牌手不能搜寻牌库。

trans-unit.source: Rogue mechanists once rummaged through the wastes of the Tidehollow, constructing unauthorized golems to threaten the hegemony of the sphinxes. The orbs put a stop to that.
trans-unit.target: 反抗的机械师曾在潮窟的荒地四处翻拣，私下构组魔像好用来威胁史芬斯的霸权。 这法球让他们无法得逞。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·52 | Outrider of Jhess | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Outrider of Jhess
trans-unit.target: 介斯前导兵

trans-unit.resname: ALA·52 | Outrider of Jhess | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 颂威 （每当一个由你操控的生物单独攻击时，该生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: ALA·52 | Outrider of Jhess | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The island nation of Jhess is under constant siege from Valeron on the mainland. Riders traverse the coastline, always on the lookout for sails or aven.
trans-unit.target: 海岛国度介斯长年受到大陆国家威烈隆的侵袭。 海岸线上遍布骑兵，随时提防着战船或艾文。

trans-unit.source: Protomatter Powder
trans-unit.target: 原质粉

trans-unit.resname: ALA·53 | Protomatter Powder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {4}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to play.
trans-unit.target: {4}{W}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：将目标神器牌从你的坟墓场移回场上。

trans-unit.source: "There is no such thing as scrap metal. All such material can be repaired with the proper bonding agent."\n—Quennus, metallurgeon
trans-unit.target: 「没有所谓的废铁。 只要有所需的结合触媒，这些东西全都可以修好。」 ～金属医师昆奈斯

trans-unit.source: Resounding Wave
trans-unit.target: 轰然浪潮

trans-unit.resname: ALA·54 | Resounding Wave | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.\nCycling {5}{W}{U}{B} ({5}{W}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle CARDNAME, return two target permanents to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 将目标永久物移回其拥有者手上。 循环{5}{W}{U}{B} （{5}{W}{U}{B}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。） 当你循环CARDNAME时，将两个目标永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Sharding Sphinx
trans-unit.target: 舞翼史芬斯

trans-unit.resname: ALA·55 | Sharding Sphinx | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever an artifact creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may put a 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature token with flying into play.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当由你操控的一个神器生物对牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以将一个1/1蓝色，具飞行异能的振翼机神器生物衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Whether mechanical or biological, life finds a way to propagate itself.
trans-unit.target: 不论机械生命或生体生命，都有办法繁衍。

trans-unit.source: Skill Borrower
trans-unit.target: 借招法师

trans-unit.resname: ALA·56 | Skill Borrower | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Play with the top card of your library revealed.\nAs long as the top card of your library is an artifact or creature card, CARDNAME has all activated abilities of that card. (If any of the abilities use that card's name, use this creature's name instead.)
trans-unit.target: 你以展示牌库顶牌的方式进行对战。 只要你的牌库顶牌是神器或生物牌，CARDNAME便具有该牌的所有起动式异能。 （若任何异能用到了该牌的名称，则改为用此生物的名称）

trans-unit.source: Spell Snip
trans-unit.target: 剪咒

trans-unit.resname: ALA·57 | Spell Snip | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{1}，否则反击该咒语。 循环{2} （{2}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.source: "Magic cast through a hand of flesh is just as weak as the flesh itself."\n—Lodus of the Ethersworn
trans-unit.target: 「肉身挥手施展的法术，就如该肉身般脆弱。」 ～乙金盟的罗得斯

trans-unit.source: Sphinx's Herald
trans-unit.target: 史芬斯传令

trans-unit.resname: ALA·58 | Sphinx's Herald | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice a white creature, a blue creature, and a black creature: Search your library for a card named Sphinx Sovereign and put it into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}，{T}，牺牲一个白色生物，一个蓝色生物，以及一个黑色生物：从你的牌库中搜寻一张名称为史芬斯君王的牌，并将之放置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: He calls a riddle through the gaps of cloven clouds, hoping for an answer.
trans-unit.target: 他向层云缝隙叫唤着谜题，希望能得到回应。

trans-unit.source: Steelclad Serpent
trans-unit.target: 覆铁巨蛇

trans-unit.resname: ALA·59 | Steelclad Serpent | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't attack unless you control another artifact.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控其他神器，否则CARDNAME不能进行攻击。

trans-unit.source: "From the highest towers to the deepest sea, all life must be touched by etherium."\n—Lodus of the Ethersworn
trans-unit.target: 「从最高的塔到最深的海，其间所有生物都该感受乙金。」 ～乙金盟的罗得斯

trans-unit.resname: ALA·60 | Tezzeret the Seeker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tezzeret the Seeker
trans-unit.target: 致知者泰兹瑞

trans-unit.resname: ALA·60 | Tezzeret the Seeker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: +1: Untap up to two target artifacts.\n-X: Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost X or less and put it into play. Then shuffle your library.\n-5: Artifacts you control become 5/5 artifact creatures until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: +1：重置至多两个目标神器。 -X：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用小于或等于X的神器牌，并将它放置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。 -5：由你操控的神器成为5/5神器生物直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Tortoise Formation
trans-unit.target: 龟壳阵型

trans-unit.resname: ALA·61 | Tortoise Formation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control gain shroud until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物获得帷幕异能直到回合结束。 （它们不能成为咒语或异能的目标。）

trans-unit.source: At sea, the Jhessian fleet strikes swiftly and decisively. On land, facing the elite cavalry of Valeron, its marines must rely on more cautious strategies.
trans-unit.target: 在大海，介斯舰队以调度灵巧著称。 在陆地，对抗威烈隆菁英骑兵的战士得依靠更谨慎的策略。

trans-unit.source: Vectis Silencers
trans-unit.target: 纬提断音客

trans-unit.resname: ALA·62 | Vectis Silencers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{B}: CARDNAME gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Whenever it deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature.)
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}：CARDNAME获得死触异能直到回合结束。 （每当此生物对任一生物造成伤害时，消灭后者。）

trans-unit.source: Even on Esper, there are those who eschew the use of magic in favor of simpler methods.
trans-unit.target: 就算在艾斯波，也有些人讨厌使用法术，而偏好更简单的解决之道。

trans-unit.source: Ad Nauseam
trans-unit.target: 倒胃口

trans-unit.resname: ALA·63 | Ad Nauseam | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost. You may repeat this process any number of times.
trans-unit.target: 展示你的牌库顶牌，并将该牌放入你手上。 你失去与该牌之总法术力费用等量的生命。你可将此流程重复进行任意次数。

trans-unit.source: When the task spilled over into undeath, he stopped calling it his life's work.
trans-unit.target: 当任务在他死后的生涯仍需持续，他便不再称此为「终生使命」。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·64 | Archdemon of Unx | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Archdemon of Unx
trans-unit.target: 温各大恶魔

trans-unit.resname: ALA·64 | Archdemon of Unx | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, trample\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a non-Zombie creature, then put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token into play.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏 在你的维持开始时，牺牲一个非灵俑生物，然后将一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·64 | Archdemon of Unx | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The necropolis at Unx was once a living city, its streets untrodden by death.
trans-unit.target: 温各的古陵寝曾是个生机盎然、充满活力的都市。

trans-unit.source: Banewasp Affliction
trans-unit.target: 食肉蜂纠缠

trans-unit.resname: ALA·65 | Banewasp Affliction | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhen enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, that creature's controller loses life equal to its toughness.
trans-unit.target: 生物结界 当受此结界的生物置入坟墓场时，该生物的操控者失去等同于其防御力的生命。

trans-unit.source: The consuming undeath of Grixis terrifies the survivors of Vithia, but its fauna is just as fearsome.
trans-unit.target: 不死生物横行格利极，让威西亚王国的幸存者惊骇万分；但该处的动物也是一样可怕。

trans-unit.source: Blister Beetle
trans-unit.target: 刺螫甲虫

trans-unit.resname: ALA·66 | Blister Beetle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Warriors of the Rip Clan wear their beetle-acid scars proudly, even modifying clothing and armor to better display the trophy.
trans-unit.target: 撕肉族战士以身上的虫酸伤疤为傲，甚至为此修改衣物与铠甲好凸显此类徽章。

trans-unit.source: Bone Splinters
trans-unit.target: 碎骨贯身

trans-unit.resname: ALA·67 | Bone Splinters | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to play CARDNAME, sacrifice a creature.\nDestroy target creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为使用CARDNAME的额外费用。 消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.source: Witches of the Split-Eye Coven speak of a future when Grixis will overflow with life energy. For now, they must harvest vis from the living to fuel their dark magics.
trans-unit.target: 在共眼集法术师谈述的未来中，格利极将会充满生命能量。 而目前来说，他们得从活物采收生命来当作黑暗法术的能量。

trans-unit.source: Corpse Connoisseur
trans-unit.target: 死尸鉴赏家

trans-unit.resname: ALA·68 | Corpse Connoisseur | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you may search your library for a creature card and put that card into your graveyard. If you do, shuffle your library.\nUnearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

trans-unit.source: Centuries of careful practice have elevated the casting of protective spells to an art form. What little offensive magic remains on Bant stands little chance of breaching them.
trans-unit.target: 几百年的仔细练习，使得施放防护咒语已迈入艺术境地。 而班特原本便积弱不振的攻击咒语势力根本没机会穿透过去。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME is unblockable.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.target: 藉由承平时期所安插的探子之助，介斯海军成功袭击了威烈隆的海岸城镇

trans-unit.target: 「文词只是浪费时间。 毁灭这语言人人都懂。」 ～萨坎沃

trans-unit.source: Waveskimmer Aven
trans-unit.target: 掠浪艾文

trans-unit.resname: ALA·207 | Waveskimmer Aven | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nExalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 颂威 （每当一个由你操控的生物单独攻击时，该生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.source: The greatest gift you can give a sea aven is solitude.
trans-unit.target: 你能给海艾文最好的礼物，就是让他们独行天下。

trans-unit.source: Windwright Mage
trans-unit.target: 领风法师

trans-unit.resname: ALA·208 | Windwright Mage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Lifelink (Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life.)\nCARDNAME has flying as long as an artifact card is in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 系命 （每当此生物造成伤害时，你获得等量的生命。） 只要你的坟墓场有神器牌，CARDNAME便具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: She knows the names and secrets of each of Esper's twenty-three winds.
trans-unit.target: 艾斯波二十三种风的名字与秘密，她都一清二楚。

trans-unit.source: Woolly Thoctar
trans-unit.target: 粗茸索塔兽

trans-unit.source: One of the most ferocious and deadly gargantuans, the thoctar never sees its worshippers, but it often awakens surrounded by gifts and sacrifices.
trans-unit.target: 索塔兽是最凶暴而致命的巨兽之一，他从来看不到自己的崇拜者，但醒来时身边经常围绕着礼物与祭牲。

trans-unit.source: Lich's Mirror
trans-unit.target: 巫妖秘镜

trans-unit.resname: ALA·210 | Lich's Mirror | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you would lose the game, instead shuffle your hand, your graveyard, and all permanents you own into your library, then draw seven cards and your life total becomes 20.
trans-unit.target: 若你将输掉这盘对战，则改为将你的手牌、坟墓场与所有你拥有的永久物洗入你的牌库，然后抓七张牌且你的总生命成为20。

trans-unit.source: It shows not what you are but what you were.
trans-unit.target: 映照出的不是你，而是过去的你。

trans-unit.source: Minion Reflector
trans-unit.target: 仆从映镜

trans-unit.resname: ALA·211 | Minion Reflector | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature comes into play under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, put a token into play that's a copy of that creature. That token has haste and "At end of turn, sacrifice this permanent."
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非衍生物的生物在你的操控下进场时，你可以支付{2}。 若你如此作，则将一个衍生物放置进场，且是该生物的复制。 该衍生物具有敏捷异能及「在回合结束时，牺牲此永久物。」

trans-unit.source: To crack a mirror is to provide an opening for the reflection to escape.
trans-unit.target: 若打破镜子，就会给里面的映影开个出口逃离。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·212 | Obelisk of Bant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Obelisk of Bant
trans-unit.target: 班特碑

trans-unit.resname: ALA·212 | Obelisk of Bant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{G}，{W}，或{U}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·212 | Obelisk of Bant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Whether incorporated into the structure of castles or admired as lone symbols, the obelisks stand for Bant's values of loyalty, honor, and truth.
trans-unit.target: 不论是由于上面所镌刻的种姓系统，或是纯粹当作象征，此碑都代表了班特的价值观：忠贞，荣誉，以及真诚。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·213 | Obelisk of Esper | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Obelisk of Esper
trans-unit.target: 艾斯波碑

trans-unit.resname: ALA·213 | Obelisk of Esper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{W}，{U}，或{B}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·213 | Obelisk of Esper | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It is a monument as austere, unyielding, and inscrutable as Esper itself.
trans-unit.target: 此碑象征了严峻，执拗与深沉，正如同艾斯波本身。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·214 | Obelisk of Grixis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Obelisk of Grixis
trans-unit.target: 格利极碑

trans-unit.resname: ALA·214 | Obelisk of Grixis | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{U}，{B}，或{R}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·214 | Obelisk of Grixis | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Like most features of Grixis, the obelisks that remain from the time of Alara now exist only for dark exploitation.
trans-unit.target: 正如格利极的大部分东西，此碑是从阿拉若的时代留存至今，现在却只被利用来行使黑暗意图。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·215 | Obelisk of Jund | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Obelisk of Jund
trans-unit.target: 勇得碑

trans-unit.resname: ALA·215 | Obelisk of Jund | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{B}，{R}，或{G}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·215 | Obelisk of Jund | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Volcanic ash-winds batter it, climbing vines overwhelm it, dragonfire roasts it, and yet it still stands as a testament to a forgotten world.
trans-unit.target: 历经火山酸风拍打，爬行藤蔓覆盖，巨龙火焰烧灼，它始终屹立不摇，代表属于某个遗忘世界的试炼。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·216 | Obelisk of Naya | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Obelisk of Naya
trans-unit.target: 纳雅碑

trans-unit.resname: ALA·216 | Obelisk of Naya | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{R}，{G}，或{W}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·216 | Obelisk of Naya | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Centuries have passed since the plane shattered, yet the obelisks of each shard faithfully serve their long-forgotten purpose.
trans-unit.target: 时空分裂已历经数百年，而每个断片的石碑依旧忠实地执行那早遭遗忘的任务。

trans-unit.source: Quietus Spike
trans-unit.target: 封喉刺

trans-unit.resname: ALA·217 | Quietus Spike | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature has deathtouch.\nWhenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half his or her life, rounded up.\nEquip {3}

trans-unit.resname: ALA·218 | Relic of Progenitus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Relic of Progenitus
trans-unit.target: 祖神兽遗宝

trans-unit.resname: ALA·218 | Relic of Progenitus | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Target player removes a card in his or her graveyard from the game.\n{1}, Remove CARDNAME from the game: Remove all graveyards from the game. Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：目标牌手将一张牌从其坟墓场移出对战。 {1}，将CARDNAME移出对战：将所有坟墓场移出对战。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·218 | Relic of Progenitus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Elves believe the hydra-god Progenitus sleeps beneath Naya, feeding on forgotten magics.
trans-unit.target: 地精相信多头龙神是他们的祖神兽，正在纳雅地底沉睡着，以遭遗忘的法术为食。

trans-unit.resname: ALA·219 | Sigil of Distinction | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sigil of Distinction
trans-unit.target: 明辨印记

trans-unit.resname: ALA·219 | Sigil of Distinction | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
CARDNAME comes into play with X charge counters on it.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each charge counter on CARDNAME.
Equip—
Remove a charge counter from CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进场时上面有X个充电指示物。 CARDNAME上每有一个充电指示物，佩带此武具的生物便得+1/+1。 佩带～从CARDNAME上移去一个充电指示物。

trans-unit.source: Arcane Sanctum
trans-unit.target: 玄秘圣所

trans-unit.resname: ALA·220 | Arcane Sanctum | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play tapped.\n{T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进场。 {T}：加{W}，{U}，或{B}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: "We must rely on our own knowledge, not on the dogma of the seekers or the mutterings of the sphinxes."\n—Tullus of Palandius
trans-unit.target: 「我们得依赖自己的知识，而不是致知者的文件、史芬斯的呢喃。」 ～帕连迪的突卢兹

trans-unit.source: Bant Panorama
trans-unit.target: 班特全景

trans-unit.resname: ALA·221 | Bant Panorama | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{1}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic Forest, Plains, or Island card and put it into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {1}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本的树林，平原，或海岛牌，并将之横置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Bant's hearts are as pure as its air and as bright as its skies.
trans-unit.target: 班特的心思如空气纯净，似天空明亮。

trans-unit.source: Crumbling Necropolis
trans-unit.target: 崩毁古陵寝

trans-unit.resname: ALA·222 | Crumbling Necropolis | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play tapped.\n{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进场。 {T}：加{U}，{B}，或{R}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: "They say the ruins of Sedraxis were once a shining capital in Vithia. Now it is a blight, a place to be avoided by the living."\n—Olcot, Rider of Joffik
trans-unit.target: 「据说塞卓基司曾是威西亚帝国的美丽首都。 现在却是枯萎、生人勿近的地方。」 ～裘非骑兵团的傲克

trans-unit.source: Esper Panorama
trans-unit.target: 艾斯波全景

trans-unit.resname: ALA·223 | Esper Panorama | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{1}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic Plains, Island, or Swamp card and put it into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {1}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本的平原，海岛，或沼泽牌，并将之横置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Esper is an expansive canvas painted by precise, controlling hands.
trans-unit.target: 艾斯波有如块广大帆布，由精细而全面控制的手上色。

trans-unit.source: Grixis Panorama
trans-unit.target: 格利极全景

trans-unit.resname: ALA·224 | Grixis Panorama | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{1}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic Island, Swamp, or Mountain card and put it into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {1}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本的海岛，沼泽，或山脉牌，并将之横置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: There is no height above Grixis that is free from the stench of death.
trans-unit.target: 格利极没有一块能让你摆脱死亡气息的高地。

trans-unit.source: Jund Panorama
trans-unit.target: 勇得全景

trans-unit.resname: ALA·225 | Jund Panorama | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{1}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic Swamp, Mountain, or Forest card and put it into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {1}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本的沼泽，山脉，或树林牌，并将之横置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: The sky is the dragon's throne, the seat from which it issues its fiery decrees.
trans-unit.target: 天空是龙的王座，他在该处宣布火热裁决。

trans-unit.source: Jungle Shrine
trans-unit.target: 丛林祭祠

trans-unit.resname: ALA·226 | Jungle Shrine | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play tapped.\n{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进场。 {T}：加{R}，{G}，或{W}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: On Naya, ambition and treachery are scarce, hunted nearly to extinction by the awe owed to terrestrial gods.
trans-unit.target: 野心与背叛在纳雅并不常见，早已被对现世神明的崇敬猎捕得近乎灭绝。

trans-unit.source: Naya Panorama
trans-unit.target: 纳雅全景

trans-unit.resname: ALA·227 | Naya Panorama | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{1}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic Mountain, Forest, or Plains card and put it into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {1}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本的山脉，树林，或平原牌，并将之横置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Between the thunderous footfalls of Naya's behemoths lie moments of perfect quiet.
trans-unit.target: 在纳雅的贝西摩斯雷鸣足声间，藏着片刻的纯粹宁静。

trans-unit.source: Savage Lands
trans-unit.target: 蛮野大地

trans-unit.resname: ALA·228 | Savage Lands | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play tapped.\n{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进场。 {T}：加{B}，{R}，或{G}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.
trans-unit.target: 勇得这世界与其间居民一样残酷。 各种野蛮搏斗在大地划下伤痕，大地则型塑这些蛮兽，构成无法控制的残暴循环。

trans-unit.source: Seaside Citadel
trans-unit.target: 海滨殿堂

trans-unit.resname: ALA·229 | Seaside Citadel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play tapped.\n{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进场。 {T}：加{G}，{W}，或{U}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: For wisdom's sake, it was built high to gaze on all things. For glory's sake, it was built high as a testament of power. For strength's sake, it was built high to repel all attacks.
trans-unit.target: 为了智慧，它建在高地来监看万物。 为了荣誉，它建在高地以验证勇武。 为了力量，它建在高地好斥退攻势。
